nsubj makes child	13.431912122015953
dobj makes prayer	13.431912122015953
case candle before	13.431912122015953
amod candle lit	13.431912122015953
nmod:before makes candle	13.431912122015953
det candle a	11.640152652787897
det prayer a	10.947005472227952
det child A	9.540091823905327
punct makes .	7.654259798793296
root ROOT makes	7.635854371250581
